math_challenge_description: Test Your Math Skills With This Interactive Game. Solve Problems Involving Addition, Subtraction, Multiplication, And Division. The Game Adjusts Difficulty Based On Your Selected Level.
math_challenge_complete_message: Great Job! You've Completed The Math Challenge. Check Your Results Below.
speed_calculation_description: Test and improve your mental math skills with this fast-paced calculation game. Solve problems quickly to earn more points!
